# Advanced Programming
[![Build Status](https://api.travis-ci.org/rcourses/jrAdvPackage.png?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/rcourses/jrAdvPackage)

This is a teaching package created and used by [Jumping Rivers](www.jumpingrivers.com). To install the package run the 
following commands

```{r eval=FALSE}
install.packages("drat")
drat::addRepo("jr-packages")
install.packages("jrAdvPackage")
```
